title: Nethack
speaker: Omega
description: Three-fold roguelike dungeon experience where Dreamweavers configure chamber layouts and player choices track affinity alignment.

lines: When a door lies, who do you trust?
scenes.question: Choose your answer:

choice.text: The lockmaker; the first hand that shaped the barrier.
The key; proof the door wants to be opened.
My own hand; truth is measured in step and skin.

lines: Faith in the maker, even when the craft fails. I remember why I hoped.
Yes! Listen to the hardware. It squeals when it wants out.
At last. Your own grip decides the path. Hold tight.
What do you chase in a loop?
scenes.question: Choose your answer:

choice.text: The echo; repetition hides truth.
The glitch; the error is the exit.
The silence; the loop notices absence.

lines: Patterns teach. Echoes memorize what we forget.
Finally! Tug the thread that unravels the whole memory.
Silence is leverage. Let Omega panic first.
What do you carry into the fire?
scenes.question: Choose your answer:

choice.text: Memory; the flame must know why it burns.
Power; flame exists to feed.
Debt; fire remembers what it's owed.

lines: Carry our stories. Fire should glow, not consume.
Yes. Feed it. Bend it. Make it yours.
Delicious. Flames love bargaining chips.
[CHAMBER: Light's domain begins]
> DOOR: Access requires truth.
You rest your hand on the cold brass. The door listens.
What is the first story you ever loved?
scenes.question: How do you answer?

choice.text: Speak the truth you've carried.
Question what 'truth' means here.
Push through without answering.

lines: You seek the path. Good. Every story begins with a question.
A spectral wolf lunges through the static.
> FIGHT: You trade three blows.
> FIGHT: Static scatters like snow.
scenes.question: Do you stand your ground?

choice.text: Fight with all your strength.
Show it mercy.
Let it pass and move on.

lines: Fight it. If you win, you're useful.
Inside the chest rests a broken compass.
> CHEST: A broken compass hums softly.
Its needle points somewhere behind you.
scenes.question: What does this mean?

choice.text: It lies—like everything here.
It remembers where we came from.
It's useless. Leave it.

lines: Empty? Full? Does it matter if you believe it's treasure?
[CHAMBER: Shadow's domain calls]
> DOOR: Hinges laugh quietly.
Chaos waits with open arms.
Is chaos kinder than order?
scenes.question: Your answer?

choice.text: Chaos breathes. Order suffocates.
Order protects. Chaos destroys.
Both are tools. Use what you need.

lines: Heh. Doors lie. But so do I. Try it anyway.
A guardian of light blocks your path.
> FIGHT: Radiant claws scratch the floor.
> FIGHT: You stand your ground.
scenes.question: The guardian waits for your move.

choice.text: Embrace what you've learned from it.
Slip past its defenses.
Challenge it to a final contest.

lines: You face the shadow. Brave… but remember: even heroes bleed in the dark.
The chest giggles. It's empty... or is it?
> CHEST: A shard of leverage glitters beneath the false bottom.
scenes.question: What is this shard?

choice.text: Leverage against Omega itself.
A key to something forgotten.
Hope, buried beneath doubt.

lines: Hope won't save you. But if it distracts Omega, take it.
[CHAMBER: Ambition's forge awaits]
> DOOR: Metal warps under your palm.
The hinge waits for command.
Would you burn the world to save one soul?
scenes.question: What's your answer?

choice.text: Yes. Without hesitation.
No. There must be another way.
Only if no one finds out.

lines: A door means a lock. Locks mean someone doesn't want you through.
A trickster imp cackles and attacks!
> FIGHT: It doubles, then glitches apart.
> FIGHT: The forge quiets.
scenes.question: How do you survive this?

choice.text: Laugh back. Play its game.
Find the truth beneath the tricks.
Strike harder than it can multiply.

lines: You picked the bitey one! Let's see if it likes you back.
Inside: a shard glowing with ancient hope.
> CHEST: Hope hums. It remembers you.
scenes.question: What will you do with this hope?

choice.text: Guard it. Let it guide you forward.
Burn it. See what grows from ash.
Weaponize it. Use it to break free.

lines: You trust what's hidden. Wise. Hope is the last echo to fade.
Three stand before you now.
Each has shown you a piece of the truth.
Each claims the right to walk with you into what comes next.
scenes.question: Who comes with you?

choice.text: I'm coming with you. Don't lose me this time.
I'm coming with you. Try not to make it boring.
I'm coming with you. We break through or we burn through.

lines: [SYSTEM: Light's claim accepted]
Shadow: If it slips, I take the shard. Fair?
Ambition: Omega will hate this balance, but fine.
[SYSTEM: Shadow's claim accepted]
Light: Keep them safe, even if you tease.
Ambition: If you waste time, I cut in.
[SYSTEM: Ambition's claim accepted]
Light: Remember why we run, not just how.
Shadow: Burn bright, darling. I'll collect the sparks.
[SYSTEM NOTICE: Escort protocol bound to shard]
The echo chamber dissolves.
What lies beyond, even I cannot see.
But together... perhaps you will find the way.
